content.text: I usually take a walk to clear my head. Do you have any ways of clearing your head?
I ride horses to clear my head, but I need to be more mindful of my surroundings when I do so.
Why is that? Are you worried about falling off?
Yes, I fell off a horse once and it was not fun.
I fell off a bike when I was younger and it was pretty scary.
Thanks! I have a collection of larp weapons and armor, do you have any cool hobbies?
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park. He loves to run around and play with other dogs.
That sounds like fun! I have a little boy named Owen, but he's too young for the dog park yet.
I'm sure he'll enjoy it when he's older.
I hope so! What's your favorite thing about riding horses?
I love the feeling of freedom when I'm riding. It's like I'm one with the horse.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to try horseback riding.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
